summary: We audit and issue opinions annually on IRS's financial statements and on related internal controls (e.g., processes to reasonably assure that transactions are properly authorized and recorded). During our FY 2021 audit , we identified 4 new deficiencies in information system controls. We also determined that IRS implemented 68 of the 120 recommendations we made to address previously reported deficiencies in financial reporting and information...
title: Management Report: IRS Needs to Improve Financial Reporting and Information System Controls
